channel.title: Aeresan || Hyperion At Its Finest || soon BETA
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://aeresan.com/images/logo.png[/img][B] Aeresan is a Project in developing by [u][b]Lost Valentino, Wolfs Darker, ThePharaoh.[/b][/u] We strive for perfection to make a unique and enjoyable server. We also try to update our project daily to keep you up to date. If you've any suggestions for use to improve please let them below and we try our best to make that as good as possible!
If you're supporting us, please leave comment to this thread.
Thanks in advance.
*Thread is still under construction. [/center]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img69/1019/icmt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122084602/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img][COLOR=orange]Melee[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=green]Combat Formulas ( Accuracy and Max Hit ) - 100%[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=orange]Special Attacks - 80%[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=orange]Correct Animations, Delays, etc - 80%[/COLOR]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122082216/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img][COLOR=orange]Ranged[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Combat Formulas ( Accuracy and Max Hit ) - 100%[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Special Attacks - 0%[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=orange]Correct Animations, Delays. Ammo, etc - 50%[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122182528/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img][COLOR=orange]Magic[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Accuracy Formula - 100%[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Spell Effects ( Ex: Ice barrage freezing the target) - 0%[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Correct Animations, Delays, Projectiles, etc - 100%[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/2/24/20111217070425!Prayer-icon.png[/img][COLOR=orange]Prayer[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=orange]Normal Prayers - 90%[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=green]Curses - 100%[/COLOR]

[*]MiningAll Rocks Support [*]All Pickaxe Support [*]Prospecting [*]Correct Timers [*]Rock Respawning [*]Random Gems
[/COLOR] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img19/9242/fletchingd.png[/img][COLOR=green]Fletching
[*]Log cutting, [*]Unfinished items stringing, [*]Bolt and arrows creation, [*]Correct interfaces, with timers[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/6114/cookingni.png[/img][COLOR=green]Cooking
[*][COLOR="#00FF00"]Item Cooking ( Can be cooked on range / fire ) [*]Item on Item, such as chocolate bar on cake = Chocolate cake[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="#FF0000"]Burning Chance, with working cook gloves and depends on your cook level,[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="#00FF00"]Correct interface, with timers.[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/6556/r8m2.png[/img][COLOR=green]Fishing
[*][COLOR="#00FF00"]All tools, baits, and fishes up to rocktails [*]Correct anims, tools and baits, [*]Timers depending on your fishing level, the fish you attempting to catch, [*]Avaliable spots up to 474 objects[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/9995/3uo.png[/img][COLOR=red]Slayer
[*]Correct levels for the right npc's [*]Slayer Task [*]Correct Dialogues [*]Slayer Masters [*]Slayertower [*]Npc Drops
[/COLOR]

[*][COLOR="#00FF00"]Herb Cleaning [*]Unfinished Potions Creation [*]Finishing Potions [*]Tars Creation [*]Mix Potions[/COLOR]

[*][COLOR="#00FF00"]All Axes Support [*]All Trees Support [*]Perfect Timer [*]Adze with Full Effects [*]Bird Nests and Special Armours[/COLOR]

@King_JC wrote:

One of the most ugliest versions of RuneScape regarding the models and animations, but in terms of what you have done with it, looks impressive. Especially the interfaces.
